roleset.name: eliminate completely
roleset.note: ERADICATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'eradicate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from eradicate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The suit , assigned [*] to federal Judge Kimba Wood , seeks a permanent injunction , back pay for judges who [*T*-1]have been forced [*-2] to retire , reinstatement of retired judges and `` other affirmative relief necessary [*] to eradicate the effects of ( New York 's ) unlawful employment practices . ''
example.arg: the effects of ( New York 's ) unlawful employment practices

example.name: Arg0, 1
example.text: The idea behind using octopamine analogues to augment the biological control is that natural enemies will be more effective in their eradication of the pests.
